org.mockito.listeners

接口 MockCreationListener

  • 所有超级接口:
    MockitoListener

    public interface MockCreationListener
extends MockitoListener
    Notified when mock object is created. For more information on listeners see MockitoFramework.addListener(MockitoListener).

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onMockCreated(Object mock, MockCreationSettings settings)
      Mock object was just created.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onMockCreated

        void onMockCreated(Object mock,
                   MockCreationSettings settings)
        Mock object was just created.
        参数:
        mock - created mock object
        settings - the settings used for creation
